Text.Page:
, a word. There's a rumor going around that Thulsa's captured General Kanmur's soul.

General...Kanmur. The hero of Kaiator. I believe you were there when Killian...returned his body.

I don't care if it's really him or not. Find this abomination and tear it apart!
Well, if it was Kanmur, his soul is free now, as it should be. If it wasn't him, it's good it never saw daylight.
